notes.races: Type indicates the broad category of ancestry/species
notes.characters: Types include Deity, Player Character, and NPC. Tags include divine ranks and Dramatis Personae status
notes.organizations: Type indicates the organization's primary function
notes.locations: Type indicates the scale/nature of the location
notes.creatures: Type distinguishes natural animals from supernatural/monstrous beings
notes.quests: Type indicates quest category. Use the native is_completed boolean field to track completion status
notes.notes: Type indicates note category. Rules Reference type provides important campaign mechanics and context to agents. Tags control categorization and processing status
